description: This context describes a stock intraday trading algorithm using historical 1-month data. The AI should generate efficient, fully automated trading code based on minute-level prices, daily buy signals, and equity tracking.

algorithm.strategy: Buy at 9:00 AM if conditions match, sell intraday before close to maximize profit.

buy_criteria.condition: Buy if 9:00 AM price >= Opening Market price

sell_criteria.condition: Sell before close to maximize intraday profit

algorithm.capital_allocation: Always invest $1,000 per trade, compounded daily.
algorithm.equity_tracking: Track EOD equity after each trade.

notes: Use minute-level price data to simulate trades for backtesting.
Apply capital allocation of $1,000 per trade compounded daily.
Track equity growth over time and highlight Buy vs Skip days for analysis.
Optimize for highest intraday profit using avg_sell_percent as guideline.
